steps.title: Add OS module import
steps.description: Import the Node.js OS module to access system temp directory
steps.context: The 'os' module provides operating system-related utility methods including os.tmpdir() to get the system temp directory

steps.title: Modify storage path configuration
steps.description: Replace hardcoded storage path with OS temp directory
steps.context: Use os.tmpdir() to get the system's temporary directory and create a subdirectory for our app's storage

steps.title: Add fallback mechanism
steps.description: Implement fallback if temp directory is not accessible
steps.context: If the system's temp directory isn't accessible, fall back to a directory in the current working directory

steps.title: Add persistent storage option
steps.description: Add configuration option to use persistent storage instead of temp storage
steps.context: Allow specifying a STORAGE_PATH environment variable to override the temp directory with a persistent location

steps.title: Update error handling
steps.description: Enhance error handling for storage-related operations
steps.context: Add specific error messages and recovery strategies for temp directory access issues

steps.title: Update Dockerfile
steps.description: Modify Dockerfile to handle the new storage approach
steps.context: Update the Dockerfile to pass environment variables for storage configuration
